input.name: __VIEWSTATE

span.div: The Greene Central School will be closed to students from 3/16/2020 - 5/15/2020 due to the Coronavirus.
The district will post up-to-date Coronavirus information here (click here), in addition to sending our global connect calls, when appropriate.

a.data-caption:
School is currently closed until May 15th
This page will be used as a resource to keep our community informed about COVID-19 (coronavirus)

div.span: The District will continue to provide meals every Monday:
- Meals will be provided by pick up or delivery every Monday
from 11:00am-12:30pm at the HS main entrance or by bus
home delivery. This meal distribution will contain five days
of breakfast and lunch for any student that has requested it.
- If you would like to receive the meals please call the school at
607-656-4161 and we will put you on the list of meal requests.

a.onclick: ga('send', 'event', 'URL', 'Link', 'New York State Department of Health COVID-19 Webpae');

div.a: New York State Department of Health COVID-19 Webpae
